assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Drs. Fuciarelli and Polimanti are both receiving research grants from Pfizer Inc. to conduct epigenetic studies of TTR amyloidosis. The other authors reported no biomedical financial interests or potential conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was conducted using summary association data generated by previous studies. Owing to the use of previously collected, deidentified, aggregated data, this study did not require institutional review board approval.
